name: Hyper Tether
description:
Controls: WASD to move, mouse to aim, and click to fire your tether. Tether two things together and watch them fly! 

Art:

 https://twitter.com/RohirrimRowan

Coding: 

https://orumcan.com/

https://aurinred.itch.io/

Sound and Music: 

https://soundcloud.com/mingmm

We are planning to keep updating this game and fleshing out the idea! There is a lot of potential for both combat and puzzle mechanics, and we will eventually be turning this into a fully-fledged zelda-style adventure!

Planned features: 

  • Many different puzzle mechanics! Locks and keys, buttons, portals, slingshots, and so much more. 
  • Elemental Explosions. Join elements together for greater effects!
  • Many more enemies, and much more in-depth combat!
  • "Endless Mode": Fight against ever-increasing waves of enemies, and hold out for as long as you can!
  • "Adventure Mode": The classic Zelda experience! Explore the dungeon, solve puzzles, unlock new abilities, and fight through enemies on your way to the final boss. 
  • Character select! Each character uses their tether differently. Fling yourself across the room, swing enemies around like a wrecking ball, or send things flying with anti-gravity.
